price: ឱមនុស្សលោក. ពួកអ្នកគឺជាអ្នកដែលត្រូវការអល់ឡោះ បំផុត។ ហើយអល់ឡោះមហាមានលើសលប់ ជាទីកោតសរសើរ។
arabic: ۞ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ أَنتُمُ ٱلۡفُقَرَآءُ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۖ وَٱللَّهُ هُوَ ٱلۡغَنِيُّ ٱلۡحَمِيدُ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nāsu antumu al-fuqarāu ilā al-lahi wal-lahu huwa al-ghaniyu al-ḥamīdu
